name: Heron Shield
description:
The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill Heron Strike.
While preparing this Skill: Grant 2 Shield points to the character to which this is attached.
descriptionraw: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12074]</color>.\nWhile preparing this Skill: Grant 2 $[K6] points to the character to which this is attached.
descriptionreplaced: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill <color=#FFFFFFFF>Heron Strike</color>.\nWhile preparing this Skill: Grant 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points to the character to which this is attached.
